titleStmt.title: Verner Kept Busy All the Time

bibl.title: Verner Kept Busy All the Time
Untitled
Lake Andes Wave

div1.p: W. W. Verner, the well man, has just finished putting down a tubular well for T. S. Silvis, equipping it with a good wind mill and pump. Mr. Verner's reputation as a first-class well man is widely known and as a consequence he is kept busy all the time.
